name: Ludo (Jason Warrick)
description:
Have you ever wanted to play games but don't know where to start? Have you ever wanted to show a friend or family member a game but they're too hard or confusing?

Then Ludo is for you!

Featuring 3 unique arcade games, each with their own tutorial, Ludo will teach you how to play games, and show you a good time while doing it! Collect coins and set a high score in one game to unlock the next, can you beat them all?

------------------------------------------

All of the assets were made by me except for the font from Kenny.nl

All controls are listed in the tutorials in-game

Play by clicking the download button below!

Note: The Linux version has not been playtested yet, so I can't say there won't be bugs!
